replies.body:
The change to player damage is not a good one.

Most of the damage dealt was ALREADY from the player, not the units, especially in the earlygame but also in the lategame. When most matches have your opponent win with only one unit alive, or you win with only one unit alive--and this IS what happens more often than not--it's the player damage which consistently chips away at HP bars, and this change will only exemplify that trait.
